name: Bitspace
body: # BITSpace A space combat game with a fun and educational AI system. # Install Install node.js and node package manager. Once this is done, just running npm install from the base directory will get all of the dependencies installed. # Run Once BITSpace is installed, and each time that you modify the client side script, run cake build. Then just running ./bin/bitspace-server -c config.json will get everything up and running.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
